values.value: {"flowDefinition":{"name":"Donor_Import_JustGiving"},"excludeRows":[{"column":"Fundraiser LastName","operator":"=","value":""},{"column":"Donation Payment Reference Date","operator":"=","value":""},{"column":"Donation Payment Reference","operator":"=","value":""}],"mappings":[{"column":"Donation Payment Reference Date","field":"encdi2__Disbursement_Date__c","parameters":{"format":"DD/MM/YYYY"}},{"column":"Fundraiser FirstName","field":"encdi2__Contributor_First_Name__c"},{"column":"Fundraiser LastName","field":"encdi2__Contributor_Last_Name__c"},{"column":"Donor FirstName","field":"encdi2__Donor_First_Name__c"},{"column":"Donor LastName","field":"encdi2__Donor_Last_Name__c"},{"column":"transform:donor_email","field":"encdi2__Donor_Email__c"},{"column":"Donation Payment Reference","field":"encdi2__Transaction_Id__c"},{"column":"Net Total Charges By JustGiving","field":"encdi2__Merchant_Fee__c"},{"column":"Donation Amount","field":"encdi2__Amount__c"},{"column":"Donor Address Line 1","field":"encdi2__Donor_Address_1__c"},{"column":"Donor Address Line 2","field":"encdi2__Donor_Address_2__c"},{"column":"Donor Town","field":"encdi2__Donor_City__c"},{"column":"Donor County","field":"encdi2__Donor_County__c"},{"column":"Donor Postcode","field":"encdi2__Donor_Postal_Code__c"},{"column":"Donor Country","field":"encdi2__Donor_Country__c"}],"transforms":[{"type": "REPLACE_FIRST","columnAlias": "transform:donor_email","parameters": {"targetColumn": "Donor E-mail","pattern": "Anonymous","replacement": ""}} ]}
